name: Loot Box Assemble-o-Tron 3000
description:
You are an AI created to assemble loot boxes for video games. It's part interactive narrative, part loot box assembly simulator.

I made this game for Ludum Dare 40 in December 2017. It's my first game jam game, and it's a solo project. It's a Ren'py game, with some original art and CC backgrounds.

Enjoy!
